website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around subwoofer to buy when you have a small budget with high expectations.
pros: 1,600 maximum wattage will produce a noticeable boost in the low-range volume and intensity
Subwoofers offer a nice, balanced frequency distribution for clear sounds
cons: Improper installation or bad connections to the sound system can result in harmful popping noises

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: Highly reccommend. I bought 2 along with q power vented box and phantom 4000 watt d class.. my entire system is anerican bass and its giving my expedition hell. The lows are taring up my truck. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: My rms and the speakers pretty much match and I feel like the speaker can ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is no joke loud. I'm running the audiopipe cal-1500d and it's taking everything I can give it. My rms and the speakers pretty much match and I feel like the speaker can take even more. Very impressive. i was running a 12 p3d2 and a type r swd4(I think that's the model). This is pretty much meeting them. The ohm load was 1.47 this speaker is 2.04 so less power and the same sound but a lot better sq. I have it in the q power big box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Great subwoofer. American Bass makes the best subwoofers in this price range. I put this in a T-line tuned to about 33hz. I got a Pioneer running on 2 ohms for 800 watts rms. Takes it no problem and is asking for much more. I bet this subwoofer could take 1000 or more in the right box. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Blake D.

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever
customer_reviews.text: I swapped out my p3's for them! Best decision ever!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: thirty-0ne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't last 6 months i purchased 2 sets they sound good but poor quality!! Don't waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Boom goes the Prius
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is for 300 including a fosgate 650 watt amp, tnt 1544 and a tuned 42htz box I’m hitting 140 in a hatchback.... That’s absolutly insane 👍😁
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Loud clean and clear
customer_reviews.text: Got two in a custom box on a audio pipe 2 k in a 98 Tahoe did a 145.2 sealed its the best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Chris c

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Best subwoofer I ever had for a 15. Seems to work great with my Rockford fosgate t1500-1bdcp amp, even though it needs to be powered by VFL 4800.1 amp, but still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Kashif Mcduffie

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing it slams hard. I have this in my 2014 Chevy Cruze and it hits really hard.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sub for the price hands down dnt be scared to buy very well built speakers
customer_reviews.author: Louis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing subwoofer comes with a decal for your car and subwoofer does good bass with little power
customer_reviews.author: zachary murray

customer_reviews.title: Great sub amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sub amazing quality. Was skeptical at first now I'm glad I made the purchase. Great sub for the price. On 1200 watts not even halfway and is already beating good. Can't wait to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: excellent subwoofer fast shipping and well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this subwoofer and it arrived in 2 days it came well pakaged in 3 boxes excellent condicion the subwoofer sounds amazing and is pretty heavy very well built subwoofer will definatly order another one thank you jb tool sales and thank you amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Edgar alvarez

customer_reviews.title: 5 cuft tuned to 40 hrts pretty impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these with a ph4000 amp put them in a custom box 9.5 cuft tuned to 40 hrts pretty impressive
customer_reviews.author: xtrem

customer_reviews.title: This sub is worth every bit of the 138 I ...
customer_reviews.text: This sub is worth every bit of the 138 I paid for. I have this thing running off of a shark audio 2500 @ 2 ohms in a box tuned 34 hz and this sub kills the highs. I have 1 of these 15s and people think I have multiple subs. (12s, 15s, etc) Plan on getting another come cyber Monday. I also have it inverted to show off the basket and motor of this little beast.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend item for anyone who is looking for some serious bass. It's not a competition woofer but it can take loads of power much more than rated. Ordered 2 to the UK and it's got here quite quickly packaging was all right but I think could be more protection.
customer_reviews.author: David Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all when it’s rated higher then the sub ...
customer_reviews.text: Sub didn’t last a week and started making a very loud popping sound. Not happy at all when it’s rated higher then the sub it was replacing and didn’t last a week.
customer_reviews.author: john p jones

customer_reviews.title: Hold on to your butts
customer_reviews.text: Very good subs. Bought 2 15s, got them running on a hifonics Zeus 2500w monoblock that I also got on prime for $200. Once you get these subs dialed in they are monsters (clutchfield.com has a good guide to tuning subs). The only concern I have is for my hearing, as well as the possibility of my sunroof and rear hatch window falling off, not even joking.
customer_reviews.author: bcrosser87

customer_reviews.title: great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a 4th one for my truck I have 3 currently running. .67. Ohms on a hifonics Brutus elite 2500.1 d and it sets car alarms off crazy lows with my custom slot port cricket box
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Joel83
customer_reviews.text: I have two of the tnt 15's going off an mmats D100HC LET ME TELL YOU IT'S THE REAL DEAL at frist i was skeptical but when I hope it up in the porterd box hey I loved it
customer_reviews.author: joel richardson

product_meta.title: American Bass TNT1544 15 inch Dual 4 Ohm Car Stereo Subwoofer
product_meta.description: American Bass 15" Subwoofer Dual 4 Ohm This listing is for one brand new American Bass TNT-15 15" dual 4-ohm subwoofer. American Bass has designed a TNT series subwoofer that offers a cast frame that is made to handle high output with improved power handling and durability. The design of the American Bass TNT series subwoofers offers a multilayer high-density foam surround, flat T-yoke with hi-extend pole price, and multiple CONEX spiders. Specifically designed with a cooling motor for ultimate power handling and gut-wrenching bottom end bass. Please see below for more features and specifications. Features and Specifications: Black powder finish with heavy-duty stamped basket Perimeter vents for better voice coil cooling Kevlar fiber enforced non-pressed paper cone Over-sized 1.4" 3-layer foam surround Hi-temp 4 Ohm 4-layer voice coil with Nomex protection Mirror image double Conex spider system Double stacked hi-energy magnets Customs-made rubber gasket Customs-made rubber magnet boot Voice Coil Diameter: 3" Impedance: Dual 4 Ohm FS: 38.3Hz Qms: 4.949 Qes: 0.630 Qts: 0.559 Vas: 52.07 MMS: 335.9g Xmax: 0.57" SPL: 88.5dB/m BL TESLA-M: 14.33 RMS Power: 800 Watts Max Power: 1600 Watts Mounting Depth: 7.63" Mounting Width: 13.97" This listing is for one (1) American Bass TNT-15 subwoofer
feature_bullets: Black powder finish with heavy-duty stamped basket
Perimeter vents for better voice coil cooling
Kevlar fiber enforced non-pressed paper cone
Hi-temp 4 Ohm 4-layer voice coil with Nomex protection
